title: Sweethearting in Public Procurement (2023)
highlights: Approximately 20% to 50% of men in The Bahamas are reported to be unfaithful.
Unfaithful married men exhibit higher rates of domestic violence and psychological abuse compared to unmarried men.
12.1% of women reported experiencing unwanted sexual intercourse or physical violence from their partners.
40.6% of women with unfaithful partners had conceived children with them.
Women whose partners are unfaithful are more likely to want to leave the relationship.
